title: Newly Engaged Kevin & Astrid, Plus: Co-Host Demi Burnett
description:
Demi is back as guest co-host this week with Rachel. “Bachelor in Paradise” alums Kevin Wendt and Astrid Loch call in to talk about their recent engagement, wedding plans, and what their life is like now in Canada. Plus, Rachel and Demi talk about their past experiences with “ghosting.”

Be sure to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

Thanks to our sponsors:

Hello Fresh: HelloFresh.com/BHH80/ code BHH80

The Farmer’s Dog: TheFarmersDog.com/Bachelor
